sentences.en: All employees will refer to each other by the honorific suffix "san".
sentences.cn: 所有雇员相互称呼时都须在名字后添加敬语san（日语表示“先生”，“女士”）。

sentences.en: But do you see a prefix, suffix, or root that you know?
sentences.cn: 但你是否看到你认识的前缀 、 后缀或词根了?

sentences.en: But only if the GAC as a whole does not like a suffix must the board take these objections into account—and then issue a detailed explanation if it overrides them.
sentences.cn: 但是，只有在GAC也不同意新域名后缀的情况下，董事会才会考虑这些反对意见。 而且如果要撤销这些域名的话，它需要发布一份详细的解释报告。

sentences.en: E - mail - Simply put, is to use the domain name suffix enterprises email address.
sentences.cn: 电子邮箱 - 简单的说就是用企业自主域名为后缀的电子邮件地址.

sentences.en: Otherwise, the suffix will not be added.
sentences.cn: 否则，后缀将不会被添加。

sentences.en: Suffix Arrays for Searching: implementation complete code, has been tested.
sentences.cn: 后缀阵列搜索: 执行完整的源代码, 已经过测试.

sentences.en: The arrival of a new internet suffix is a potential goldmine.
sentences.cn: 新网络域名的出现是一座潜在的金矿.

sentences.en: The compiler automatically adds the lib prefix and a suffix.
sentences.cn: 编译器自动添加前缀和后缀.

sentences.en: The diminutive suffix - ling in " duckling " denotes affection.
sentences.cn: "duckling " (小鸭子)中意指"小"的字尾-ling表示亲昵.

sentences.en: The name suffix that you typed already exists in the specified forest.
sentences.cn: 您输入的名称后缀已经在指定的林中存在.

sentences.en: The name suffix that you typed is already excluded from routing.
sentences.cn: 您输入的名称后缀已从路由中排除.

sentences.en: The specified conflict option prefix or suffix contains invalid characters.
sentences.cn: 指定的冲突选项前缀或后缀包含无效字符.

sentences.en: The suffix - er is added to verbs to form nouns.
sentences.cn: 字尾 -er 加到动词之后构成名词.

sentences.en: The suffix " ist " can be added to'sex " to form the word'sexist ".
sentences.cn: 后缀ist加在 sex 之后可构成sexist一词.

sentences.en: The suffix "ist" can be added to "sex" to form the word "sexist".
sentences.cn: 后缀ist加在sex之后可构成sexist一词。

sentences.en: These ships were all numbered with the suffix LBK.
sentences.cn: 这些船都有编号，末尾都是LBK。

sentences.en: This required that all subtrees are all under the same suffix, since there is no common parent between suffixes.
sentences.cn: 这需要所有的子树都位于相同的后缀中，因为后缀之间不存在公共父节点。

sentences.en: We add the suffix " ly " to make the adjective " quick " into the adverb " quickly ".
sentences.cn: 我们在形容词 “ quick ” 后加 “ ly ” 构成副词 “ quickly ”.

trans.tran_en: a letter or letters added to the end of a word to form a new word, such as ‘ness’ in ‘kindness’ or ‘ly’ in ‘suddenly’
